locale.name: tr_TR
locale.message: Hizmet şartlarını kabul edebilmeniz için derginizin bir ISSN'sinin olması gerekir. Dergi Ayarları sayfasında ISSN bilgisini girebilirsiniz. Hizmet koşullarının aşağıda görüntülenebilmesi için öncelikle derginin ISSN'si girilmelidir.
Makaleler ihraç edilirken bir hata oluştu. Sunucu günlük dosyaları daha fazla bilgi içerebilir.
Sayı ihraç edilirken bir hata oluştu. Sunucu günlük dosyaları daha fazla bilgi içerebilir.
İstenen UUID geçerli değil veya düzgün olarak biçimlendirilmedi.
İstenen UUID ile hiçbir arşiv bulunmamaktadır.
Arşivlenen dosya bulunamadı. Henüz paketlenmemiş olabilir veya paket silinmiş olabilir.
The PKP PLN plugin will deposit your published content into the PKP Private LOCKSS Network for preservation.

PKP Private LOCKSS Network

Please read the overview of the PKP PLN and complete this simple form. This option will enable inclusion of your journal in the Public Knowledge Project Private LOCKSS Network (PKP PLN).
The PKP PLN plugin has been enabled.
The PKP PLN plugin has been disabled.
The PLN plugin requires either the Acron plugin or a periodic scheduling tools such as 'cron.'
As Primary Contact, I, in good faith, accept and confirm the following terms and conditions for participation in the Public Knowledge Project’s Private LOCKSS Network (PKP-PLN):
This is your journal's unique identifier for the PKP PLN. You may need to share this with PKP PLN administrators for support purposes.
If for some reason there are no terms listed above or you know these terms have been updated, click Refresh to update the terms listed above.
Please choose an deposit object type.
Please choose a deposit object threshold.
Agreement to the network's terms of use is required in order to deposit to the PLN.
The PLN deposit statuses are described here.
Are you sure you want to reset this deposit? It will be repackaged and resent to the processing server.
The PKP PLN is not currently accepting deposits.
The PKP PLN is accepting deposits.
Check the status of your deposits.
Your journal must have an ISSN to deposit content to the PKP PLN.
There was an error connecting to the PKP PLN - please contact your system administrator.
The PKP PLN terms of use have been updated. Agreement with new terms is required to continue depositing.
CURL support must be enabled to proceed.
ZipArchive support must be enabled to proceed.
The Archive_Tar PHP extension must be installed before the PKP PLN can be enabled.
The PKP PLN requires PHP version 5 or higher.
The BagIt library, which is included with OJS, cannot be loaded, probably due to a missing prerequisite.
Network error {$error} connecting to the PLN to get the service document.
Network error {$error} connecting to the PLN to send the deposit.
Network error {$error} connecting to the PLN to get a status update for deposit.
PLN server returned HTTP error {$error} when attempting to get the service document.
PLN server returned HTTP error {$error} when sending the deposit.
PLN server returned HTTP error {$error} when checking the status of a deposit.
Reports PLN Status and recent article titles for the staging server.
